name: swift-docstrings
description: Xcode-style proportional font rendering for Swift /// doc comments

commands.title: Swift Docstrings: Convert // to /// in the current file
Swift Docstrings: Wrap comments to line length in the current file

swiftDocstrings.enabled.description: Enable Xcode-style proportional font rendering for /// doc comments.

swiftDocstrings.fontFamily.description: Font family for doc comment text. Use a proportional/sans-serif font for the Xcode look.

swiftDocstrings.fontSize.description: Optional font size override for doc comment text (e.g. "0.95em", "13px"). Leave empty to inherit the editor font size.

swiftDocstrings.codeColor.description: Color for inline code (backtick-wrapped text and parameter names). Accepts any CSS color value. Leave empty to inherit the doc comment color.

swiftDocstrings.tagColor.description: Color for doc tag keywords (Parameters, Returns, Throws, etc.). Accepts any CSS color value. Leave empty to inherit the doc comment color.

swiftDocstrings.boldMarkLines.description: Bold the contents of // MARK: comment lines, similar to Xcode.

swiftDocstrings.maxCommentLineLength.description: Maximum line length for the Wrap Comments command. Lines will be wrapped to fit within this length (including indentation and // or /// prefix).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
